# Panache Feats
## Overview
**Panache Feats**

Panache feats interact with the swashbuckler’s panache class ability or the panache granted by the [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)|Amateur Swashbuckler]] feat. Swashbucklers can take panache feats as bonus feats.

(**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 136)


| **Panache Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefit** |
|---|---|---|
| [[Confounding Tumble Deed (Feat)\|Confounding Tumble Deed]] | [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)\|Amateur Swashbuckler]] or panache class feature; [[Canny Tumble (Feat)\|Canny Tumble]], [[Acrobatics (Skill)\|Acrobatics]] 7 ranks | When you avoid attacks of opportunity and hit a foe, you can deny it its Dex bonus to AC for 1 round |
| [[Disarming Threat Deed (Feat)\|Disarming Threat Deed]] | [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)\|Amateur Swashbuckler]] or panache class feature; [[Diplomacy (Skill)\|Diplomacy]] 2 ranks, [[Intimidate (Skill)\|Intimidate]] 2 ranks | Use [[Intimidate (Skill)\|Intimidate]] without making the target unfriendly |
| [[Dueling Cape (Feat)\|Dueling Cape]]\* | [[Dodge (Feat)\|Dodge]], [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)\|Sleight of Hand]] 1 rank | Use your cape as a snaring buckler |
| Enrage Opponent\* | Cha 13, [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)\|Amateur Swashbuckler]] or panache class feature, [[Persuasive (Feat)\|Persuasive]] | Lower angered opponent’s defenses until she attacks you |
| [[Extra Panache (Feat)\|Extra Panache]] | [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)\|Amateur Swashbuckler]] or panache class feature | Gain 2 extra panache points |
| Lightning Draw\* | [[Quick Draw (Feat)\|Quick Draw]], swashbuckler initiative deed, swashbuckler level 7th | Draw weapons reflexively |
| [[Pommel Strike Deed (Feat)\|Pommel Strike Deed]] | [[Amateur Swashbuckler (Feat)\|Amateur Swashbuckler]] or panache class feature; base attack bonus +3 | Attack with a light or one-handed piercing weapon’s pommel and knock down foes |
| Structural Strike\* | [[Knowledge (Skill)\|Knowledge]] (engineering) 5 ranks, precise strike class feature or precise strike deed | Use precise strike against creatures normally immune |

 \* This is a combat feat, and can be selected as a [[Brawler|brawler]], [[Fighter|fighter]], [[Gunslinger|gunslinger]], swashbuckler, or [[Warpriest|warpriest]] bonus feat.
